description: The fiercest and most long endured rivalries in the sport are back for round two - from French competition to cyclocross podium places. Join Dan Lloyd in the battle...

asset.title: GCN's Top 10 Cycling Rivalries | Volume 2
asset.description:
The fiercest and most long endured rivalries in the sport are back for round two - from French competition to cyclocross podium places. Join Dan Lloyd in the battle... 🥊

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/nw
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/nv

Back for part 2 of our top ten pro cycling rivalries, ex pro Dan Lloyd reveals his favourites, from road to track to 'cross...

🇫🇷 Anquetil vs. Poulidor 🇫🇷
🇧🇪 Merckx vs. Ocaña 🇪🇸
🇺🇸 Armstrong vs. Pantani 🇮🇹
🇳🇱 Van der Poel vs. Van Aert 🇧🇪 
🇬🇧 Pendleton vs. Meares 🇦🇺

What's your favourite cycling rivalry? Let us know in the comments! 


If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/nu

Watch more on GCN...
Top 10 Cycling Rivalries Part 1 📹  http://gcn.eu/Rivalries1
The GCN Show Ep. 243 📹  http://gcn.eu/243GCN

Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
